ðŸ“– Summary: Pangolin is a self-hosted reverse proxy that creates secure tunnels via WireGuard, enabling access to private resources without port forwarding. It features a centralized authentication system with access control rules and a user-friendly dashboard for management. Deployment is simplified with Docker Compose and an installation script.
